alert.note: Alert for Florence; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:52AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Florence and Williamsburg Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 650 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms 7 miles northwest of Gourdin, or 12 miles southwest of Kingstree, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Kingstree, Andrews, Trio, Warsaw, Salters, Cades, Nesmith, Indiantown, Gourdin, Earle, Hebron, Morrisville, Henry, Sardis, Scranton, Olanta, Lane, Greeleyville and Stuckey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
